tgt_original: atrotpattikrame sevādibhedacatuṣṭayenotpannakramasya bhāvanāvidhirabhihitaḥ |  guhyasamājottaratantre uktamasti- caturvidhamupāyastu bodhivajreṣu varṇitaḥ |

eṣāṁ caturṇāṁ yogānāṁ ( upāyānāṁ )  nāmāni dattāni tatraiva- sevāvidhānaṁ prathamaṁ dvitīyamupasādhanam |  sādhanantu tṛtīyaṁ vai mahāsādhanaṁ caturthakam ||  utpattikramasya sevopasādhanasādhanamahāsādhanabhedāt sādhanacatuṣṭayamasti |
